official.name: pyroll-cli
official.description: Provides a command line interface to PyRolL.

official.name: pyroll-report
official.description: Provides a routine to generate an extensible HTML report page displaying the simulation results. Integrates with `pyroll-cli` if installed.

official.name: pyroll-export
official.description: Provides several routines to export the data within PyRolL data structures to other well known formats, such as pandas DataFrame, Python dicts, CSV and XML. Integrates with `pyroll-cli` if installed.
